snippet: After years of infighting, Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the New Jersey Devils, has bought out his partners and now owns all of the team and its home, the Prudential Center.
abstract: Jeff Vanderbeek, controlling owner of New Jersey Devils, has bought out his partners and now owns team and its home, Prudential Center, Newark; he had been negotiating simultaneously with his lenders, who were owed about $77 million in overdue debt, and team’s other owners, Michael Gilfillan and Peter Simon.
lead_paragraph: After years of infighting, Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the New Jersey Devils, has bought out his partners and now owns all of the team and its home, the Prudential Center.

headline.seo: Vanderbeek Buys Out Fellow Devils Owners
headline.main: Vanderbeek Buys Out His Fellow Owners of the Devils
headline.print_headline: Vanderbeek Buys Out His Fellow Owners of the Devils
